news_header: Financials lead Q4 earnings growth, with strong performance from the Mag 7 and other sectors.
news_text: The Q4 earnings season has begun with large-cap Financials showing a remarkable +49% YoY growth, outpacing other sectors. The Mag 7 continues to drive earnings, projected to grow +21% YoY, while the rest of the S&P 500 and Nasdaq-100 also show positive growth. Analysts expect earnings growth for the S&P 500 to be between +10% and +15% YoY in the coming year. The Nasdaq-100's higher margins contribute to its outperformance. Companies need to monitor margins closely to meet growth expectations.
